Posts.Content: Hi everyone ....just wanting some advice i am 37 not on the pill , have 2 small children , i have felt a lump in my right breast more so closer to the centre of my chest but on the edge of the breast , its sore /tender .My doc sent me for an ultrasound which she said was clear, a few small cysts in my other breast so what should i do wait for another cycle ? take my docs word for it ? or persue it ? , it feels more like an oval shape gland , it slides under my touch .Scared its a lymphnode , i have had esophagus probs ...gastritis GERD after stressful event , so i am worried its a node related to the esophagus .Sorry post is long , would appreciate any help
Posts.Title: breast ultrasound results
